contextId.information: Moses uses this exaggeration to show how impossible  he believed it was to provide food for all the people of Israel. (See [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: all the fish in the sea

contextId.information: This is an exaggeration to emphasize how numerous they were. AT: "They are extremely numerous" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: They cover the face of the earth
